output.sentences: Texas has a lot of war memorials.
Bob had a goal to go to all of the war memorials around Texas.
He loved visiting them and reading all the plaques.
He took a picture of each place he visited to make a scrapbook later.
After a long day of exploring he walked to his hotel.
